The war won’t start until after Christmas or sometime around that but it will have lots of mods and probably will be very pc intensive.

still working on it

You need to think of a name and flag for your country and a bit of backstory

coment if interested

https://imgur.com/a/gdf3c

Here is my version of the map

Gray means they are non-player city-states. Still need cities for Blue and Green.

Rules:

 

No offensive moves on first turn

To do diplomacy, you must launch a comms sat in Equatorial orbit

To view enemy movements, you must launch a spy satellite in a polar orbit

You can't edit bases unless there is a bug which makes said base unusable

Each base produces 15 tons of material you can use per turn

You can stockpile material; you don't have to use it instantly

You must hold a base for 1 turn in order to launch from it

You need to make your own designs- no stock or fanmade/downloaded craft                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

 You can move a maximum of 70km with Naval and Ground units per turn

 

Version: Either 1.3 or 1.2.2
